hero.subtitle: FullStack developer transforming curiosity into code. My greatest pleasure is learning new things and applying this knowledge to real solutions.
about.title: About Me
about.bio1: With over 2 years of web development experience, I find in programming the perfect combination of creativity and problem-solving. My journey is marked by a constant pursuit of clean code and elegant solutions.
about.bio2: I advocate for direct and objective technologies like the AstroJS framework, which delivers high performance and quality without complications. My goal is simple: create fast applications that solve real problems.
